dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 5118 IH: National Capital Planning Commission District of Columbia Home Rule Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Ms. Norton introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To amend title 40, United States Code, to remove the authority of the National Capital Planning Commission with respect to property owned by the District of Columbia, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the National Capital Planning Commission District of Columbia Home Rule Act.

section.header: Removal of the authority of the National Capital Planning Commission with respect to property owned by the District

subsection.header: Recommendation of the Commission for transfers of jurisdiction of property
subsection.text: Section 8124 of title 40, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by amending the second sentence to read as follows: In the case of a transfer among Federal authorities or a transfer between Federal and District of Columbia authorities, the National Capital Planning Commission shall recommend the transfer before it is completed.; and
by striking subsection (b) and redesignating subsection (c) as subsection (b).

subsection.header: Approval of the Commission for proposed developments and projects
subsection.text: Section 8722 of title 40, United States Code, is amended—

paragraph.text: in the section heading, by striking and district;
in subsection (a), by striking and District of Columbia governmental each place it appears;
in the first sentence of subsection (b)(1)—

subparagraph.text: by striking or District of Columbia; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (c)(1), by striking and District; and

subsection.header: Approval of the Commission To sell land

paragraph.text: Title 40, United States Code, is amended by striking section 8734.
The table of sections at the beginning of subchapter IV of chapter 87 of title 40, United States Code, is amended by striking the item relating to section 8734.

subsection.text: The amendments made by this section shall take effect on the date of the enactment of this Act.
